FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary table key.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key that refers to the course this record belongs to.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Name of the instance (Exercise 1, Practice 7...).

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the quiz that SQLab will use to obtain the questions.

FIELD.NAME: activitypassword
FIELD.COMMENT: Password required to start the activity.

TABLE.NAME: sqlab_attempts
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores users attempts at sqlab activities.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary table key.

FIELD.NAME: sqlabid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the sqlab activity that was attempted.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user whose attempt this is.

FIELD.NAME: attempt
FIELD.COMMENT: Sequentially numbers this student's attempts at this sqlab activity.

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: The current state of the attempts. 'inprogress', 'overdue' or 'finished'.

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the attempt was started.

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the attempt was submitted. 0 if the attempt has not been submitted yet.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Last modified time.

FIELD.NAME: sumgrades
FIELD.COMMENT: Total marks for this attempt.

TABLE.NAME: sqlab_db_user_credentials
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to store the credentials of the users' PostgreSQL databases.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary table key.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User's identifier to which these credentials belong.

FIELD.NAME: username
FIELD.COMMENT: Database username for the PostgreSQL user.

FIELD.NAME: password
FIELD.COMMENT: Encrypted password for the PostgreSQL database user.

TABLE.NAME: sqlab_code_executions
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores all code executions and responses for SQLab attempts.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary table key.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the user who executed the code.

FIELD.NAME: attemptid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the attempt during which the code was executed.

FIELD.NAME: executed_code
FIELD.COMMENT: The code that was executed by the user.

FIELD.NAME: received_reply
FIELD.COMMENT: The response received from the code execution.

FIELD.NAME: action
FIELD.COMMENT: Used button.

FIELD.NAME: execution_timestamp
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp when the execution was saved in ISO 8601 format.

TABLE.NAME: sqlab_responses
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the answers to each question in the attempt for later evaluation.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Primary table key.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the user who executed the code.

FIELD.NAME: attemptid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the attempt during which the code was executed.

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the question to which the stored response corresponds.

FIELD.NAME: response
FIELD.COMMENT: Response given by the user.

FIELD.NAME: currentmaxgrade
FIELD.COMMENT: Current grade after penalties for this response.

FIELD.NAME: execution_count
FIELD.COMMENT: Execution count (only for the code evaluation button).

FIELD.NAME: gradeobtained
FIELD.COMMENT: Grade obtained for this response.

FIELD.NAME: feedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Feedback obtained from the SQL function, if there is something wrong with the response.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the response was created.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp when the response was last modified.
